interestingcomments.content:
School report on Cameras /!/ I am doing a report on cameras (all types of cameras) for school for a Culture and Technology class. 

What are some important things that I should mention that have to do with basic information for the introduction, how they have changed humans from an evolution standpoint, the environment, human health, government, culture, etc? I have a lot of ideas, but I am lacking in the sources department. Are there any sources for really good information? 

Thanks!
